name: Quantum Satisfaction
description:
From Wikipedia:

Quantum satis (abbreviation q.s. or Q.S.) is a Latin term meaning the amount which is enough...The specification of quantum satis for an ingredient essentially means "Add as much of this ingredient as is needed to achieve the desired result, but not more."

Use the provided mathematical functions to reach the target number within the time limit. Knowledge of addition, multiplication, division, and exponents will be required!

Made in 3 hours for the Bean Jam #11! Theme: Quanta
